------=_NextPart_000_004F_01C1CA04.8A0D6C60
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

He walks out, and down the halls. He arrives in the CR room, where he sees =
Talos. "Autobot, Kup, reporting. What happaned?"

{Talos}
CR Chamber Room, =
Deck 2

Talos looked at the gathered bots here nodding as they claimed beas=
t modes for themselves, opening his comm he held up his hand to gently dism=
iss kups questions for now...he sighed internally these autobot refits were=
 eccentric to say the least. "Kenzo good to hear you're still operational, =
come to the CR chambers and get yourself a beast form, energon reports outs=
ide are rather extreme." Turning off the comm he focused his attention on C=
ondor next.

    "Condor give Sunhawk a hand with finding a spot for the si=
gnal enhancer tower." Nodding to the bot he turned back to Kup, "We've cras=
hed here on Earth or at least I think it's Earth, by all accounts of the or=
iginal beast war the ancient earth was a rather energon filled environment,=
 you may want to get conditioned for the environment with your alternate fo=
rm. As is repairs are under way, sensor range is limited for the moment and=
 communications outside the ship are being looked into."

    Grinning he n=
odded, "We've got a foothold here to complete our mission, as for now I'd l=
ike to see about getting the mess hall cleaned up and getting some of our p=
eople resting. We don't know the terrain, we don't know how many preds ther=
e are or if they're headed our way. I want every bot in good shape for when=
 we find them or they find us. Megatron is going back to cybertron, this ti=
me for good."

    Nodding again saying his piece he walked out of the CR c=
hamber room and headed for the mess hall to assess the damage, from the loo=
k of Kup it must've been pretty shook up.
